meanings: Noun (사람의 인생·소설 등에서 중요하거나 재미있는) 사건[에피소드] (=incident)

examples.korean: The episode was reported minimally in the press. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 에피소드는 언론에 최소로 보도되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The episode was reported minimally in the press. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I’d like to try and forget the whole episode. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 그 사건은 모두 잊어버리고 싶다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I’d like to try and forget the whole episode. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The whole episode had been a cruel deception. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 에피소드가 모두 잔인한 속임수였던 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The whole episode had been a cruel deception. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I tried to wipe the whole episode from my mind. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 마음속에서 그 일화 전체를 지워 버리려고 애썼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I tried to wipe the whole episode from my mind. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: So many themes and symbolism in each episode. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정말 많은 주제와 상징이 각 에피소드마다 담겨 있어. DARAKWON
examples.english: So many themes and symbolism in each episode. Add to Wordbook
